item.title: Foul Odor of Decaying Prepaid Calling Cards
item.description: Prepaid calling cards are a popular choice for international calls due to their incredibly low advertised rates. The cards often boast incredibly low per-minute rates, but these rates don’t tell the whole story. Like perishable food, prepaid calling cards have a limited lifespan once you start using them. Hidden in the fine print on the back of these cards are details about connection fees, minimum call durations, and weekly service fees.
